Title: Johnson Controls redefines the future of building safety at GSX 2025
Summary: MILWAUKEE, Sept. 30, 2025 – Johnson Controls (NYSE: JCI), the global leader for smart, healthy and sustainable buildings, is exhibiting at Global Security Exchange (GSX) 2025 in New Orleans, Louisiana, from Sept. 29th -Oct. 1st. At Booth 1955, the company will demonstrate how its proven products, digitally enabled solutions and service offerings are transforming security into a data-driven, ROI-focused discipline that enhances safety, efficiency and corporate responsibility.
